title: Classic Google Hangouts returns to iOS App Store, but only if you have the link
content:
At the end of last month, Google delisted its classic Hangouts app from iOS and Android app stores. Surprisingly, the soon to be retired Hangouts app has returned to the iOS App Store, but only if you have the link.

moreâ€¦

The post Classic Google Hangouts returns to iOS App Store, but only if you have the link appeared first on 9to5Google.
